pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-4390: Create merge rule form
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Creating a dummy structure for merge rule dialog with property selector mocked to Customer Entity. Only one field "Property" is available in this ticket. Other properties are being added as part of separate ticket.
Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


 Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

nodes.bodyText: This button(and related code) is purely temporary and is created as a placeholder, just so it's easier to verify/initiate the merge rule dialog, until the CRUD Merge Step story is finished.
